fi.yussiv.squash

Class Huffman

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.yussiv.squash.Huffman

  • public class Huffman
extends java.lang.Object
    Compresses and decompresses input based on byte frequencies using Huffman coding.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Huffman() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static HuffmanTree[] countByteOccurences(byte[] bytes)
      Counts the occurances of each byte in the input byte array that is to be encoded.
      static byte[] decode(byte[] input, HuffmanTree treeRoot)
      Decodes the contents using the parse tree that was used to create the encoding.
      static byte[] encode(byte[] input, HuffmanTree tree)
      Encodes the given input using the given Huffman parse tree.
      static HuffmanTree generateParseTree(byte[] input)
      Generates a Huffman parse tree based on character frequencies.

      • encode

        public static byte[] encode(byte[] input,
                            HuffmanTree tree)
        Encodes the given input using the given Huffman parse tree. The first byte of the returned array is the effective length of the last byte.
        Parameters:
        input -
        tree -
        Returns:
        array of bytes, where the first byte contains the amount of effectives bits of the last byte
